description: Modifies CSR attributes on a client server.

extension_requests.description: The desired extension requests (permanent data to be embedded in a signed certificate). Note that input values will overwrite current values with the same paired key.

custom_attributes.description: The desired custom attributes (transient data used for pre-validating requests). Note that input values will overwrite current values with the same paired key.

purge_extension_requests.description: Whether or not to purge the existing extension requests in the CSR attributes when updating.

purge_custom_attributes.description: Whether or not to purge the existing custom attributes in the CSR attributes instead when updating.
